item.title: How do u get npc's talking?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you mean something like a character talking, where it is over their heads,

search for something like:

                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";

Add a code similar to this one:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 670) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Use a Veracs helm on me to head to the next steps to the KQ"; } }

670 is the NPCID. 30 <=2 is the timer.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u get npc's talking?
